nytimes.title: Maureen Dowd: Call Off the Dogs
nytimes.topComment: I can't imagine the horror of a Republican winning the White House, but neither can I stand the thought of a Hillary candidacy. It wears me out just thinking about it. I could swallow the dirty tricks, and I understand that politics is a vicious, rut...

nytimes.title: Opinion: Great! Another Thing to Hate About Ourselves
nytimes.topComment:
Hannah Davis doesn't look like Hannah Davis, either. It's called photoshop. That's one thing women who are insecure about their looks should remember. The models in the magazines don't look like the models in magazines. They are all manipulated.
